Welcome to Web-BAMTâ€™s documentation!
=================================

This site contains main documentation for the 
`Web-BAMT <https://github.com/aimclub/Web-BAMT/>`_.




Each module has the following files (.py), their content has described in API docs:
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

1. Controller (endpoints, routes, queries)
2. Service (core functions)
3. Schema (docs schemas)
4. Models (table descriptions for database)

.. image:: ../images/algoritm.jpg

   faq/index
